question_text: What is one compatibility advantage SAS controllers have over SATA controllers?
answer_options: SAS controllers cannot use SATA drives
SAS controllers support both SAS and SATA drives
SAS controllers require custom operating systems
SAS controllers are incompatible with SSDs
correct_answer: SAS controllers support both SAS and SATA drives
explanation: SAS controllers are backward-compatible with SATA drives, but SATA controllers cannot use SAS drives.
